detect-errors-generate-report: Detect errors and generate a report
welcome-to-ODE: Welcome to the Open Data Editor!
welcomebanner-description:
The ODE helps data practitioners with no coding skills to explore tabular data and detect errors in an easier way. Advanced users can also edit metadata and publish their work.

The OKFN team aims to add other data formats in the future.
welcomebanner-dont-show-again: Don't show this screen on the next launch
powered-by-frictionless: This project is open source and powered by
how-ODE-handles-your-files: How the ODE handles your imported files
openlocationbanner-description: The tool makes a copy of your selections into the ODE folder on your Computer. Any changes will be made to these copies, while the original data remains unchanged.
ODE-supports-CSV-Excel-files: The ODE supports Excel & csv files
links-online-tables: You can also add links to online tables
add-xsl-or-csv-files: Add one or more Excel or csv files
error-google-sheets-address-invalid: The Google Sheets URL is not valid or the table is not publically available
error-url-not-table: The URL is not associated with a table
error-file-size-exceeds-10mb: The total size of the files exceeds 10MB. This operation might take some time...
context-menu-delete-description: Only removes this element from the ODE folder
context-menu-openlocation-description: The ODE folder where this {{fileOrFolder}} exists
are-you-sure-delete-elements: Are you sure you want to delete these elements?
are-you-sure-delete-filefolder: Are you sure you want to delete this {{ fileOrFolder, lowercase }}?
unsaved-changes-dialog-description: There are unsaved changes. Please, click save or cancel.
author: Author
preview-not-available: Preview is not available for this file format
enter-openAI-key: Please enter your OpenAI API key:
AI-assistant-default-prompt: suggest improvements to the names of the columns in the table and provide descriptions for each of them
assistant-step-dialog: If you proceed, the Open Data Editor will only share the names of the columns in your table to suggest improvements to the titles and descriptions associated with them. Do you want to proceed?
AI-assistant-enter-prompt: Please enter your prompt to the AI assistant:
name: Name
title: Title
no-options-available-for-format: No options available for this format
generating-response: AI assistant is generating the response.
AI-assistant-find-your-key: Click <link1>here</link1> to learn how to find your key. You can also check OpenAI terms and policies <link2>here</link2>.

help-resource.title: Resource
help-resource.description: A simple format to describe and package a single data resource such as a individual table or file.

help-resource/name.title: Name
help-resource/name.description: A simple name or identifier to be used for this resource. The name should be slugified e.g sales-data.

help-resource/type.title: Type
help-resource/type.description: Specifies the type of this resource.

help-resource/title.title: Title
help-resource/title.description: A human-readable title or label for this resource e.g. 'Sales Data'.

help-resource/description.title: Description
help-resource/description.description: A description of this resource. The description MUST be markdown formatted â€“ this also allows for simple plain text as plain text is itself valid markdown.

help-resource/mediaType.title: Media Type
help-resource/mediaType.description: Specifies the media type/mime type of this resource e.g 'text/csv', 'application/vnd.ms-excel' etc.

help-resource/path.title: Path
help-resource/path.description: Specifies the path of this resource. It MUST either be a URL or a POSIX path.

help-resource/scheme.title: Scheme
help-resource/scheme.description: Specifies the scheme for loading the file (file, http, ...).

help-resource/format.title: Format
help-resource/format.description: Specifies the standard file extension for this resource e.g. 'csv', 'xls', 'json' etc

help-resource/encoding.title: Encoding
help-resource/encoding.description: Specifies the character encoding of this resource e.g. 'UTF-8'. The values should be one of the 'Preferred MIME Names' for a character encoding registered with IANA.

help-resource/integrity/hash.title: Hash
help-resource/integrity/hash.description: The MD5 hash for this resource.

help-resource/integrity/bytes.title: Bytes
help-resource/integrity/bytes.description: Size of the resource file in bytes.

help-resource/licenses.title: Licenses
help-resource/licenses.description: The license(s) under which the resource is provided.

help-resource/licenses/name.title: Name
help-resource/licenses/name.description: The name MUST be an Open Definition license ID e.g. ODC-BY-1.0

help-resource/licenses/path.title: Path
help-resource/licenses/path.description: A url-or-path string, that is a fully qualified HTTP address, or a relative POSIX path for this license.

help-resource/licenses/title.title: Title
help-resource/licenses/title.description: A human-readable title or label for this license e.g. 'Open Data Commons Public Domain Dedication and License v1.0'.

help-resource/contributors.title: Contributors
help-resource/contributors.description: A name/title of the contributor (name for person, name/title of organization).

help-resource/contributors/title.title: Title
help-resource/contributors/title.description: Title of the source (e.g. document or organization name).

help-resource/contributors/path.title: Path
help-resource/contributors/path.description: A fully qualified http URL pointing to a relevant location online for the contributor.

help-resource/contributors/role.title: Role
help-resource/contributors/role.description: A string describing the role of the contributor.

help-resource/sources.title: Sources
help-resource/sources.description: Raw sources for the data resource.

help-resource/sources/title.title: Title
help-resource/sources/title.description: Title of the source (e.g. document or organization name)

help-resource/sources/path.title: Path
help-resource/sources/path.description: A url-or-path string, that is a fully qualified HTTP address, or a relative POSIX path.

help-dialect.title: Dialect
help-dialect.description: File dialect concept give us an ability to manage table header and any details related to specific formats.

help-dialect/title.title: Title
help-dialect/title.description: A human-readable title for this dialect.

help-dialect/description.title: Description
help-dialect/description.description: A brief description of the dialect.

help-dialect/type.title: Type
help-dialect/type.description: CSV Dialect defines a simple format to describe the various dialects of CSV files in a language agnostic manner.

help-dialect/type/header.title: Header
help-dialect/type/header.description: It's a boolean flag which defaults to True indicating whether the data has a header row or not.

help-dialect/type/headerRows.title: Header Rows
help-dialect/type/headerRows.description: It specifies the header row or rows for multiline header.

help-dialect/type/commentChar.title: Comment Char
help-dialect/type/commentChar.description: It specifies the char to use to comment the rows.

help-dialect/type/headerJoin.title: Header Join
help-dialect/type/headerJoin.description: It specifies the header rows to combine, if there are multiple header rows.

help-dialect/type/commentRows.title: Comment Rows
help-dialect/type/commentRows.description: It specifies list of rows to ignore.

help-dialect/type/headerCase.title: Header Case
help-dialect/type/headerCase.description: It specifies case sensitivity mode. Header is case sensitive by default.

help-dialect/format.title: Format
help-dialect/format.description: CSV Dialect defines a simple format to describe the various dialects of CSV files in a language agnostic manner.

help-dialect/format/delimiter.title: Delimiter
help-dialect/format/delimiter.description: Specifies the character sequence which should separate fields. (default ',')

help-dialect/format/lineTerminator.title: Line Terminator
help-dialect/format/lineTerminator.description:
Specifies the line terminator for the csv file while reading/writing. (default '
')

help-dialect/format/quoteChar.title: Quote Char
help-dialect/format/quoteChar.description: Specifies a one-character string to use as the quoting character. (default '"')

help-dialect/format/doubleQuote.title: Double Quote
help-dialect/format/doubleQuote.description: Controls the handling of quotes inside fields. (default true)

help-dialect/format/escapeChar.title: Escape Char
help-dialect/format/escapeChar.description: Specifies a one-character string to use for escaping.

help-dialect/format/skipInitialSpace.title: Skip Initial Space
help-dialect/format/skipInitialSpace.description: Specifies how to interpret whitespace which immediately follows a delimiter. (default false)

help-dialect/format/sheet.title: Sheet
help-dialect/format/sheet.description: Specifies name of the sheet from where to read or write data. (default 1)

help-dialect/format/fillMergedCells.title: Fill Merged Cells
help-dialect/format/fillMergedCells.description: Specifies to unmerge and fill all merged cells by the visible value. (default false)

help-dialect/format/preserveFormatting.title: Preserve Formatting
help-dialect/format/preserveFormatting.description: Specifies to preserve text formatting for numeric and temporal cells. (default false)

help-dialect/format/adjustFloatingPointE.title: Adjust Floating Point Error
help-dialect/format/adjustFloatingPointE.description: Specifies to ajust the Excel behavior regarding floating point numbers.

help-dialect/format/stringified.title: Stringified
help-dialect/format/stringified.description: Specifies to stringify all cell values. (default false)

help-dialect/format/keys.title: keys
help-dialect/format/keys.description: Specifies the keys/columns to read from the json resource.

help-dialect/format/keyed.title: Keyed
help-dialect/format/keyed.description: Specifies to return the data as 'key:value' pair. (default false)

help-dialect/format/property.title: Property
help-dialect/format/property.description: Specifies the path to the attribute in a json file, if it has nested fields.
